user.title: Advanved Climate Group Helper
user.description: Create a more powerful 'Virtual Controller' for your climate devices. This group will aggregate readings and synchronize settings across all members, acting as a single smart unit.

data_description.name: A friendly name for your group (e.g., 'Living Room' or 'Whole House').
data_description.entities: Select the climate devices (thermostats, ACs) to include in this group.
data_description.current_avg_option: How the group summarizes sensor readings (Temperature/Humidity) from its members.
data_description.target_avg_option: How the group calculates the target setpoint to send to its members.
data_description.round_option: Avoid sending values with excessive precision to devices that expect strict steps.
data_description.hvac_mode_strategy: Determines how the group decides its overall state (e.g., when some devices are off).
data_description.feature_strategy: How to handle devices with different capabilities (e.g., one supports 'Fan Only', another doesn't).
data_description.temp_sensor: Select a separate sensor to be shown as the group's current temperature. Useful if device sensors are inaccurate.
data_description.expose_member_entities: Creates an attribute listing all member entity IDs.
data_description.expose_attribute_sensors: Creates extra sensor entities for the group's temperature and humidity (useful for graphs).
data_description.debounce_delay: Waits a moment after you touch controls before sending commands. Prevents flooding your network.
data_description.repeat_count: Retries commands automatically if a device misses them.
data_description.repeat_delay: The time to wait between retry attempts.
data_description.sync_mode: Control how the group interacts with manual changes made directly on physical devices.
data_description.sync_delay: A buffer time to let manual adjustments settle before the sync logic kicks in.

error.no_entities: You must select at least one climate device.
error.invalid_entity: One or more selected devices are not valid climate entities.
error.duplicate_name: A climate group with this name already exists.
error.unavailable_entities: Some selected devices are unavailable. The group will be created but may not work fully until they obey.

init.title: Configure Climate Group
init.description: Fine-tune your group's behavior. Changes take effect immediately.

data_description.entities: Add or remove devices. Removing devices stops them from being controlled by the group.

data_description.feature_strategy: How to handle devices with different capabilities (e.g., one supports 'Fan Only', another doesn't).
data_description.use_temp_sensor: Enable to use a separate sensor for the group's current temperature.
data_description.temp_sensor: Select the external sensor to use.

group_in_sync.name: Group in Sync
group_in_sync.description: True if all members match the group's target.
